title: Topological Amenability of Semihypergroups. (arXiv:2211.01479v1 [math.FA])
description: In this article, we introduce and discuss the notion of topological left amenability in the general setting of semihypergroups. We acquire several characterizations of the same in terms of certain stationary, ergodic and operator algebraic properties of the associated measure algebra. Finally, we discuss and characterize topological amenability of its sub-semihypergroups in terms of (topological) invariance properties attained on the corresponding measure algebras of the parent semihypergroup.
